attributes.action: Close all education sites & allow all students to reset the year in Sept 2020.
attributes.additional_details:
Funding should be provided to nurseries to accommodate newer pupils or change the school start age to 6.

This solution protects so many and gives us all a greater chance of combating the virus much sooner.
Mass vaccinations would ensure our economy can start to recover much sooner and reduces the negative impact on future generations significantly.

Prioritising vaccinations will save lives and resetting the education year will protect our economy and future generations long term.
attributes.background:
Allow all students to recieve a fair and promised education.

Use education sites as vaccination hubs run by medical qualified volunteers and local GP's
